00056 typedef struct rt_intr {
00057 
00058     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00059 
00060     xnholder_t link;    /* !< Link in global interrupt queue. */
00061 
00062 #define link2intr(laddr) \
00063 ((RT_INTR *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_INTR *)0)->link)))
00064 
00065     xnintr_t intr_base;   /* !< Base interrupt object. */
00066 
00067     void *private_data; /* !< Private user-defined data. */
00068 
00069     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00070

00082 
00083 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_FUSION */
00084 
00085 } RT_INTR;
